Text: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS MOVIE! It's not a made for tv movie but it's just as shitty as one if not worse! I actually watched this piece of shit movie just to see some tits and ass and what did I get, almost nothing. There's only two really quick shots of some topless girls but it only lasts like 2 seconds. So there you go, 4 seconds of tits. Thats 2 hours of my life that I'll never get back. I should have just downloaded a serender cinema movie instead.

Why didn't you just download a porno?
